thread.title: Jonathan: I didn’t back Sheriff for chair | Nigerian News Headlines Today | Breaking Newspapers News
thread.title_full: Jonathan: I didn’t back Sheriff for chair | Nigerian News Headlines Today | Breaking Newspapers News

title: Jonathan: I didn’t back Sheriff for chair | Nigerian News Headlines Today | Breaking Newspapers News
text:
tweet 
Former President President Goodluck Jonathan said yesterday he did not endorse Senator Ali Modu Sheriff as National Chairman of the People’s Democratic Party (PDP).The former President’s media aide Ikechukwu Eze, in a statement said: “The issue of endorsement never came up in the course of the visit, not at the closed door session with Sheriff nor during the former President’s interview with newsmen”, the statement said.Jonathan who repeatedly addressed Sheriff as “my chairman” during the visit, accused the media of infusing mischief in their report, stressing that he…
